name: Gabriel Lippmann
description:
Gabriel Lippmann was born in Luxembourg, which we believe is a first for our website.

Lippmann died in the middle of Atlantic Ocean, which is definitely a first.

In between, Lippmann invented color photography, for which he won the Nobel in Physics in 1908. He also...

You are not paying attention, are you? Admit it, you are staring at the mustache.

Yes... you are.

Well, that magnificent specimen is a first for our website as well!
